    • Method Detail

      • getProduct

        Product getProduct(java.lang.String productId)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                          ApiException
        Returns the Product uniquely identified by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the product, which must already exist
        Returns:
        the Product uniquely identified by ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException

      • getProductsByStatement

        ProductPage getProductsByStatement(Statement statement)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          ApiException
        Gets a ProductPage of Product objects that satisfy the criteria specified by given Statement.query. The following fields are supported for filtering and/or sorting:
        PQL Property Object Property Filterable Sortable
        rateCardId Rate card ID which the product is associated with Yes No
        status Product.status Yes Yes
        lineItemType Product.lineItemType Yes Yes
        productType Product.productType Yes Yes
        rateType Product.rateType Yes Yes
        productTemplateId Product.productTemplateId Yes No
        name Product.name Yes Yes
        description Product#description Yes No
        id Product.id Yes No
        lastModifiedDateTime Product.lastModifiedDateTime No Yes
        Parameters:
        statement - a Publisher Query Language statement which specifies the filtering criteria over products
        Returns:
        the products that match the given statement
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException

      • performProductAction

        UpdateResult performProductAction(ProductAction productAction,
                                Statement filterStatement)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                         ApiException
        Performs action on Product objects that satisfy the given Statement.
        Parameters:
        productAction - the action to perform
        filterStatement - a Publisher Query Language statement used to filter a set of products.
        Returns:
        the result of the action performed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException

      • updateProduct

        Product updateProduct(Product product)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                             ApiException
        Updates the specified Product. Note non-updatable fields will not be backfilled.
        Parameters:
        product - the product to update
        Returns:
        the updated product
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException
